quizDescription: Test your knowledge of romantic comedies with this heartwarming trivia quiz!
quizTags: Rom-Com, Romantic Movies, Comedy, Love, Relationships

questions.question: Which rom-com movie follows a woman who starts a freelance writing career after a painful breakup and ends up falling for her new boss?
options: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
questions.explanation: 'The Devil Wears Prada' stars Anne Hathaway as a young writer working for a demanding fashion magazine editor, played by Meryl Streep.

questions.question: Which rom-com movie features two characters who meet on a flight and decide to spend time together in the city of angels?
questions.explanation: 'Before Sunrise' follows a young man and woman who meet on a train and spend a magical night together in Vienna.

questions.question: Which rom-com movie centers around a man who can time travel to correct mistakes in his love life?
questions.explanation: 'About Time' tells the story of a man who discovers his ability to travel through time and uses it to find true love.

questions.question: Which rom-com movie follows the life of a young woman who has a strange ability to hear her boyfriend's innermost thoughts?
questions.explanation: 'What Women Want' stars Mel Gibson as a man who gains the ability to hear women's thoughts.

questions.question: Which rom-com movie features a high school student who makes a bet to turn a shy art student into the prom queen?
questions.explanation: 'She's the Man' is a modern retelling of William Shakespeare's 'Twelfth Night,' with Amanda Bynes playing a girl who disguises herself as her twin brother to attend his school.
